title: Songs of Love & Longing
description: Songs of Love & Longing is a collection of fantasy-themed poems and songs, all inspired by fantasy art, beautiful music, and the stories and characters from my own imagination - the Lake Traveler high fantasy series and the spin-off romantic fantasy series, the Seasons Cycle.In this new collection are poems and songs of love and longing, in strangely familiar language and a cadence meant to resonate with the magick already within you.To give you, the reader, an immersive experience, QR codes have been embedded within the text so you will be able to listen to some of the songs as you read. We hope this adds to your enjoyment of this collection.So sit back and relax, and allow my poems and songs to soothe and delight you, taking you to a world of lyrical fantasy, music and magick...
author: Cassia Hall
